author: IGN
description:
Join director Edgar Wright, along with stars Glen Powell and Colman Domingo, for a behind-the-scenes look at the deadly game and world of The Running Man in this new video for the upcoming sci-fi drama film. The Running Man also stars William H. Macy, Lee Pace, Michael Cera, Emilia Jones, Daniel Ezra, Jayme Lawson, Sean Hayes, Katy O’Brian with Josh Brolin. The Running Man opens in theaters on November 14, 2025.

In a near-future society, The Running Man is the top-rated show on television—a deadly competition where contestants, known as Runners, must survive 30 days while being hunted by professional assassins, with every move broadcast to a bloodthirsty public and each day bringing a greater cash reward. Desperate to save his sick daughter, working-class Ben Richards (Glen Powell) is convinced by the show’s charming but ruthless producer, Dan Killian (Josh Brolin), to enter the game as a last resort. But Ben’s defiance, instincts, and grit turn him into an unexpected fan favorite—an
title: The Running Man - Official 'Inside The World of The Running Man' Featurette (2025) Glen Powell

author: IGN
description:
Halloween returns to Villedor with a blend of familiar scares and new surprises. Check out the latest Dying Light 2: Stay Human trailer to see what to expect with the Halloween Showdown 2025 event, which combines the open-world experience with the Tower Raid: Halloween Run format introduced last year. Over three weeks, the event will evolve with new challenges, global goals, and rewards. Dying Light 2: Stay Human's Halloween Showdown 2025 event is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox, and PC.

#IGN #gaming
title: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - Official Halloween Showdown 2025 Trailer

description:
Tanks are one of the most sought after rewards in Battlefield 6's battle royale mode, REDSEC. Here's a quick guide to show how to claim your own tank, and some things to note while you're waiting to claim it.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Battlefield 6 REDSEC - How to Get a Tank (How to Get Vehicle Keycards)

description:
Check out the Kolguyev Update 1.6 Trailer for Arma Reforger, an action military simulation game developed by Bohemia Interactive. Players will take part in Operation Omega with the latest update that brings players to the volcanic island of Kolguyev. Explore the molten terrain and engage in deep firefights with new weapons and equipment. The Kolguyev Update 1.6 for Arma Reforger is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #gaming
title: Arma Reforger - Official Kolguyev Update 1.6 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'RTX On' Trailer for Directive 8020, a sci-fi action-adventure narrative-driven horror game developed by Supermassive Games. Players will survive the horrors of deep space after the colony ship Cassiopeia crash-lands on a planet. Endure the journey with support for DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation and Path Tracing courtesy of NVIDIA. Directive 8020 is launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

Source: https://youtube.com/nvidia

#IGN #gaming
title: Directive 8020 - Official 'RTX On' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Our elite four-person squad of ghost guessers salute Halloween with a pulse-pounding session of ghost guessing in Phasmophobia. Watch out, YOU GHOSTS. Here's Mike's point of view, and you can catch Ellen's perspective over on Outside Xtra: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QgDnhkFGqFk 

Hallowstream 2025 means scary streams every day until Halloween, with terrifying new horror games and iconic creepy classics! Check out the full Hallowstream 2025 Schedule Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL_WcVABbXAhDmHxfy5sQLImLSc1uThQTN

Hallowstream is brought to you by Outside Xbox, Outside Xtra, Oxventure and sponsor Xbox. Learn more about playing Xbox across devices at: https://www.xbox.com/en-GB/devices

#IGN #Gaming
title: MIKE's POV in Phasmophobia MULTIPLAYER 🎃 Hallowstream 2025

description:
Don't miss the ARCADIA Trailer for MindsEye, a third-person open-world action game developed by Build A Rocket Boy. Players will be able to explore the ever-changing world of ARCADIA, full of missions, races, puzzles, and challenges to interact with. With ARCADIA's easy-to-use toolset, players can create and share new experiences for the playerbase to try in MindsEye. ARCADIA is available now in MindsEys for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the TMNT Cosmetic Pack Trailer for ARK: Survival Ascended, the hit survival action-adventure game developed by Studio Wildcard. Players can now access a premium mod to attain TMNT skins as Leonardo, Donatello, Raphael, and Michelangelo, fitted with their signature weapons and voiceovers. 

Both Master Splinter and Casey Jones are also available with the TMNT Cosmetic Pack for ARK: Survival Ascended, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #ARK #TMNT
title: ARK: Survival Ascended x TMNT - Official Cosmetic Pack Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Holiday Season is here at Walt Disney World and with four different parks celebrating the fall and winter holidays, we decided to interview Cast Members at Disney World to get an inside look at what the festivities are all about at Disney World.

Festivals and Celebrations at Walt Disney World 
Magic Kingdom: (Fall) Mickey’s Not So Scary Halloween + (Holidays) Mickey’s Very Merry Christmas

Hollywood Studios: (Fall and Onward) Disney Villains: Unfairly Ever After + (Holidays) Disney Jollywood Nights

EPCOT:  (Fall) EPCOT International Food and Wine Festival + (Holidays) EPCOT Festival of the Holidays

Animal Kingdom: (Fall) Trails and  Zootopia Better Zoogether + (Holidays) Merry Menagerie and Tree of Life Experience
title: 8 Ways to Celebrate the Holidays at Disney World This Year

author: IGN
description:
In this reimagined world, where power, passion and destiny unite in an unforgettable new story, viewers are thrust back into the brutality of Ancient Rome with the shocking resurrection of the once-defeated Ashur, played by Nick E. Tarabay (“Spartacus,” “The Expanse”), who now returns as “Dominus,” the master of his own House. Fueled by vengeance and cunning ambition, Ashur rises from betrayal and bloodshed to seize power, gouging out a place for the House of Ashur in a new arena full of violence, desire and twisted loyalty.
 
The trailer teases fierce new players in Ashur’s world, including his battle-hardened gladiator trainer Korris, played by Graham McTavish (“The Witcher,” “House of the Dragon”); relentless gladiatrix Achillia, played by Tenika Davis (“Jupiter’s Legacy,” “Cabinet of Curiosities”); and the ambitious Tarchon, played by Jordi Webber ( Choose Love, “Prosper”). Expanding the Roman stage, Julius Caesar, played by Jackson Gallagher (“My Life Is Murder,” “NCIS: Sydney”)
title: Spartacus: House of Ashur - Official Red Band Trailer (2025) Nick E. Tarabay, Tenika Davis

description:
Don't miss The Replacer 'Principal's Office' Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, the latest addition to the first-person action shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. 

The Replacers are back to replacing to take the place of parents at a teacher conference while they play the latest Call of Duty. Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is launching on November 14 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #CallOfDuty #TheReplacer
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Official The Replacer 'Principal's Office' Trailer

description:
Meet two new mobs in this latest Minecraft trailer. 

A new mount and more mayhem arrive in testing. Get a look at the camel husk (an undead passive mob) and the parched (a desert-dwelling skeleton) coming to Minecraft. The two new mobs are now available to test in Java snapshot, Bedrock preview and beta.

#IGN #Minecraft #MinecraftNews
title: Minecraft - Official 'Two New Mobs' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Halloween Skins Launch Trailer for Cronos: The New Dawn, a third-person survival horror game developed by Bloober Team. 

Players will be able to access new Halloween-themed skins for Cronos: The New Dawn, with different skins based on the platforms for a blue version for PS5, a green version for Xbox Series X|S, a red skin for Nintendo Switch 2, and an orange version for PC. 

The free Halloween Skins for Cronos: The New Dawn are available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Cronos #Horror
title: Cronos: The New Dawn - Official Halloween Skins Launch Trailer

description:
Check out the Amped Gameplay Trailer for Apex Legends, the hit first-person action battle royale shooter developed by Respawn Entertainment. 

Players can access brand-new updates to Apex Legends that turn up the speed in any encounter. Take the fight to new heights with the ability to glide and move like never before in a redesigned Olympus. Apex Legends Amped is launching on November 4 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC.

#IGN #ApexLegends #BattleRoyale
title: Apex Legends - Official Amped Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Return to where it all began in these two timeless adventures. Watch the Dragon Quest 1 & 2 HD-2D Remake launch trailer for the RPG, which is a narrative continuation and ultimate conclusion of Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake. 

The Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake launch trailer shows features you can expect and gives a peek at the adventure. Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake is reimagined with new content and enhancements, including an expanded story, new enemies, new dungeons, the addition of mini-medals, and more. 

Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D is available now on Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, Windows PC, and Steam.

#IGN #DragonQuest #RPG
title: Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Animal Crossing: New Horizons trailer to see what's coming with the Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition game and a free update to the base game, available on January 15, 2026. The new Animal Crossing: New Horizons trailer gives a deep dive into the features available in Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, including improved graphics with enhanced resolution, mouse controls with the Joy-Con 2 controller, expanded online play, and more. Additionally, learn about the details of the free update coming to Animal Crossing: New Horizons for both Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch, also available on January 15, 2026. 

The free new update Ver. 3.0 features a new resort hotel run by Kapp'n's family, additional amiibo functionality, increased home storage, a new Resetti clean-up service, Luna's new Dream World, collaboration items (including collaborations with LEGO, Splatoon, and The Legend of Zelda), updates to online play, and
title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition & Free Update - Official Announce Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Accolades Trailer for The Outer Worlds 2, a sci-fi action RPG developed by Obsidian Entertainment. 

Players will embark on a journey to Arcadia to meet unique folks, take on missions, and uncover the truth behind mysterious rifts threatening all of humankind. Take a look at the latest trailer to garner the critical reception behind The Outer Worlds 2, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam and Battle.net).

#IGN #TheOuterWorlds2 #RPG
title: The Outer Worlds 2 - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Full Episode: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BnppNpgjXE8

In this snippet from podcast Beyond Ep 919, It’s almost halloween, so we’re marking the occasion by ranking the top 10 best horror video games on PlayStation, ever… but, it’s also almost mischief night, so our producer has some tricks up his sleeve to go with the treats: he’s picked 10 games, and our job is to sort them into where they go on a top 10 list - but we don’t know them in advance. So, is this a definitive list of IGN’s top 10 horror games? Definitively not, we’re just goofing around! But hey, any excuse to talk about Resident Evil 4, Silent Hill 2, P.T., and yes, Bloodborne, is good enough for us. But wait hold on which version of Resident Evil 4 are we talking about here?

This weeks show is Max Scoville, Brian Altano, and is produced by Nick Maillet

#horrorgaming  #Gaming #PlayStation
title: PlayStation's 10 Best Horror Games, Ranked in The Worst Way Possible - Beyond Clips

description:
Take a look at the Launch Trailer for Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage, a new version of the hit 3D action fighting game developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio. 

Players will be able to experience the continuation of the hit fighting game series with modern features such as crossplay, rollback netcode, and more, alongside the new "World Stage" single-player campaign. Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #VirtuaFighter5REVO #FightingGames

Players can get a look at the new Descendant coming to the game with Harris, equipped with Arche-powered mechanical arms to deal devastating blows on the battlefield. Harris is coming to The First Descendant on November 6 with Season 2 Episode 2 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

description:
Don't miss the Monster Update Launch Trailer for R.E.P.O., a co-op horror game developed by Semiwork. Players must enter eerie locations to find valuable items, handle them with care in spite of physics-based movement of objects, and extract at all costs. 

A new update has arrived for the game, packed with new enemies, upgrades, and more, alongside balancing changes and fixes. The Monster Update for R.E.P.O. is available now for PC (Steam).

#IGN #REPO #Horror
title: R.E.P.O. - Official Monster Update Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Launch Trailer for Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection, a collection of iconic arcade classics from the legendary fighting game series developed by Digital Eclipse. 

Players can access a suite of Mortal Kombat games from the '90s and early 2000s that we're playable in arcades, consoles, handhelds, and more. All of the games have been updated to suit the modern era with player-friendly features, including online play with rollback netcode, Fatality Trainer, and more. 

Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #MortalKombat #MortalKombatLegacyKollection
title: Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Scream 7 trailer for this upcoming horror film starring Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox, Isabel May, Jasmin Savoy Brown, Mason Gooding, Anna Camp, Joel McHale, Mckenna Grace, Michelle Randolph, Jimmy Tatro, Asa Germann, Celeste O’Connor, Sam Rechner, Ethan Embry, Tim Simons and Mark Consuelos.

When a new Ghostface killer emerges in the quiet town where Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell) has built a new life, her darkest fears are realized as her daughter (Isabel May) becomes the next target. Determined to protect her family, Sidney must face the horrors of her past to put an end to the bloodshed once and for all.

Scream 7 is produced by William Sherak, James Vanderbilt, and Paul Neinstein. Based on characters created by Kevin Williamson. The story is by James Vanderbilt & Guy Busick. The screenplay is by Kevin Williamson and Guy Busick.

Scream 7, directed by Kevin Williamson, opens in theaters on February 27, 2026.

#IGN #Scream7 #Slasher
title: Scream 7 - Official Trailer (2026) Neve Campbell, Isabel May, Courteney Cox

author: IGN
description:
Fox Hunt is here! The new mode for Metal Gear Solid Delta pits up to 12 players against eachother in unique stealth action! 

Become one with the environment with your camo, confuse enemies by hiding in cardboard boxes and when the time comes, drop them with some CQC! 

Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater Fox Hunt mode is available now!

#IGN #MetalGearSolidDelta #FoxHunt
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater - Official Fox Hunt Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Release Date Trailer for Raiden Fighters Remix Collection, a trilogy of 2D arcade shooting games developed by H2 Interactive Co. and Moss Co. Players will experience updated versions of the iconic Raiden Fighters, Raiden Fighters 2, and Raiden Fighters Jet with feature improvements, an online ranking system, a remixed soundtrack by renowned composers, and more. The Raiden Fighters Remix Collection is launching on February 26, 2026, for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Nintendo Switch.
title: Raiden Fighters Remix Collection - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description: Based on a true story, the 1977 kidnapping of a prominent banker grips the nation and turns the abductor into an outlaw folk hero. As the media frenzy peaks, the standoff becomes a spectacle of desperation, defiance and blurred justice, which resonates even today.
title: Dead Man's Wire - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Bill Skarsgård, Colman Domingo, Al Pacino
